content.text:
# 2019 AFC Annual Awards

| award1_type      = AFC Player of the Year
| award1_winner    = '''Men's: Akram Afif Women's:  Saki Kumagai
| award2_type      = AFC Coach of the Year
| award2_winner    = Men's: Chung Jung-yong Women's: Asako Takakura
| award3_type      = AFC Youth Player of the Year
| award3_winner    = Men's: Lee Kang-in Women's: Jun End≈ç
| award4_type      = AFC International Player of the Year
| award4_winner    =  Son Heung-min
| award5_type      = AFC Futsal Player of the Year
| award5_winner    =  Tomoki Yoshikawa
| previous      =  2018
| main          = AFC Annual Awards
| next          =  2022
}}
The 2019 AFC Annual Awards were the awards for football players and coaches of the year in Asia. The award ceremony was held in Hong Kong on 2 December 2019.
Winners
The nominees were announced on 15 November 2019.
